/* Template developed by: Jitendra Sarswat. */

#include<iostream>
#include<string>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cmath>

#define ll long long
#define Get getchar_unlocked()

int getInt() { int a=0,s=1; char c=0; while(c<33) c=Get; if(c=='-') {s=-1; c=Get;} while(c>33) {a=(a<<3)+(a<<1)+c-'0'; c=Get;} return a*s; }

using namespace std;

ll gcd(ll a, ll b) {
	if(b == 0)
		return a;
	else
		gcd(b,a%b);
}

int main() {
	int t;
	t = getInt();
	while(t--) {
		ll x1,y1,x2,y2;
		cin >> x1 >> y1 >> x2 >> y2;
		cout << gcd(abs(x1-x2),abs(y1-y2)) - 1 << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
